Generic Basic Authentication filter that checks for basic authentication headers and challenges for authentication if no authentication is provided Sets the Thread Principle with a GenericAuthenticationPrincipal.

member.name: M:CiresonWebConsole.Controllers.api.V3.WorkItemController.BulkEditWorkItems(CiresonWebConsole.Controllers.api.Models.BulkEditWorkItemModel)
member.summary: Updates Work Items specified in the ItemIds list to the values set in the 'EditedFields' of the BulkEditedWorkItemModel. Currently only supports properties on the seed object. Supported property types are as follows: enum, string, date, int, double, bool, singlecardinalityobject (i.e. AffectedUser), multiplecardinalityobject (i.e. Action Log). The EditedValue for a property with type of singlecardinality will be equal to GUID of the specified object. The EditedValue for a property with type of multiplecardinalityobject will be the object in json format.
member.returns: Returns boolean for successful update or failed update.

member.name: P:Resources.wc.AboutMessage1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Our company was born not just because we were dazzled by Microsoft System Centers amazing technology but also by the unbelievable total cost of ownership it provides. As a registered Microsoft partner, Cireson are the forward thinkers of all things considered Microsoft System Center. Through our innovative approach, we help companies harness the power of System Center whilst delivering world class value to the business. Plain and simple..

member.name: P:Resources.wc.AboutMessage2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to At Cireson the core mission is simple - focus on the user and all else will follow. Since the beginning, weve focused on providing the best user experience possible. We take great care to ensure that all our apps will ultimately serve you, rather than our own internal goal or bottom line. As a result, we strive for perfection and if you have any issues or enhancement requests then please email.
